channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: All street lights not working in street, 11th December
item.description:
Street lights not working for about a week.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Elmfield Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 11th December
item.description:
Potholes near texaco garage towards GCHQ
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Oldfield Crescent, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, overgrowth., 11th December
item.description:
See walkways on my map, flytipping, fouling and overgrowth of weeds. If these walkways were cleaned up then maybe people wouldn’t use them to dump their rubbish!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Somergate Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Gate Lock, 11th December
item.description:
The lock mechanism on the gate between the fields is broken. Although replaced with string there is a chance the sheep may escape.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Oak House Broadway Road, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Edge of road ascending Birdlip hill has collapsed in two areas. There is a serious risk of a major accident this needs to be repaired as a matter of urgency., 10th December
item.description:
Near side of road collapsed ascending Birdlip hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Lane, Witcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blockage - Between 27 and 29 Margrett Road, 10th December
item.description:
There is a consistent drain blockage, not yet resolved after attempts to clean it out previously, that is causing water to pile up on the road. Conscious of plans to improve the road in the New Year, so keen to get it resolved before or around the same time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Margrett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another mattress dumped in alley, also abandoned shopping trolley, 10th December
item.description:
A double mattress has been left in the alley, at the Larput Place end. Also a small trolley has been dumped too. They have been there for a week or so.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Hungerford Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 9th December
item.description:
Street light number 63 not working
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rectory Court road sign has been damaged, 9th December
item.description:
The road sign for Rectory Court has been damaged by a vehicle and will need replacing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Kidnappers Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Street lights not working, 9th December
item.description:
Street lights from Aston Grove to Laburnum Court on Springbank Road, Cheltenham not working since the new Fibre cables were installed recently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Aston Grove, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road drops quite badly, 8th December
item.description:
Something isn’t right with the bridge over the Brook - the road sags quite badly as you cross it and comes back up quickly as you come off it in Lane 1 heading towards Zoons Court Rbt. Lane 2 is starting to deteriorate the same.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Gilpin Avenue, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights, 8th December
item.description:
Street lights not working
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Midwinter Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street lights, 8th December
item.description:
No Street Lights Elmfield Road Cheltenham
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Elmfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ice risk from flowing water., 9th December
item.description:
There is a slow but steady flow of water across the A40 washing away any salt put down. This afternoon there was still a large amount of slush after last night's sub zero temperatures. This is a high speed crash waiting to happen on this 60mph corner and junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Warning sign and cone left by the footpath, 7th December
item.description:
Tree services workmen left some safety equipment behind after they completed work this afternoon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Buckles Close, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flashing traffic bollard approach to Elmbridge Court roundabout, 5th December
item.description:
Flashing traffic bollard approach to Elmbridge Court roundabout towards Gloucester. Previously been reported 17th August but still not resolved.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on Brooklyn Road at the junction of Edinburgh Place, 5th December
item.description:
It’s been there for about two weeks, but it’s starting to get deeper, possibly about 7 1/2 cm deep now. Can somebody take a look at it please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Suspected abandoned, 4th December
